values.description: A Long Strangle consists of simultaneously buying an OTM put and an OTM call, where both contracts have the same underlying asset and expiration date.
values.keywords: Long Strangle Options trading strategy, out-the-money call, out-the-money put, profit from volatile movements in the underlying stock, long straddle, contracts in the strategy legs, Strategy Payoff, maximum profit is unlimited
values.og:description: A Long Strangle consists of simultaneously buying an OTM put and an OTM call, where both contracts have the same underlying asset and expiration date.
